item.text: All the Israelites from Dan to Beer Sheba and from the land of Gilead left their homes and assembled together before the Lord at Mizpah.

The <st data-num="06438" class="">leaders</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="03320" class="">took</st> their <st data-num="03320" class="">places</st> in the <st data-num="06951" class="">assembly</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>, which numbered<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0702 03967 0505" class="">400,000</st> <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>-<st data-num="08025" class="">wielding</st> <st data-num="07273" class="">foot</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">soldiers</st>.

The <st data-num="01121 01144">Benjaminites</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> had <st data-num="05927" class="">gone up</st> to <st data-num="04709" class="">Mizpah</st>. Then the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="01696" class="">Explain</st> <st data-num="0349" class="">how</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">wicked thing</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">happened</st>!”

The <st data-num="0376 03881">Levite</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0376" class="">husband</st> of the <st data-num="07523" class="">murdered</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st>, <st data-num="06030 0559">spoke up</st>, “<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> and my <st data-num="06370" class="">concubine</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">stopped in</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">in the territory</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="03885" class="">spend the night</st>.

The <st data-num="01167" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st> <st data-num="06965 05921">attacked</st> me and at <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">surrounded</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> where I was <st data-num="05921" class="">staying</st>.<n id="1" /> They <st data-num="01819" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="02026" class="">kill</st> me; instead they <st data-num="06031" class="">abused</st> my <st data-num="06370" class="">concubine</st> so badly that she <st data-num="04191" class="">died</st>.

I <st data-num="0270" class="">took hold of</st> my <st data-num="06370" class="">concubine</st> and <st data-num="05408" class="">carved</st> her <st data-num="05408" class="">up</st> and <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> the pieces<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">throughout</st> the <st data-num="07704" class="">territory</st> <st data-num="05159" class="">occupied</st> by <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="06213" class="">committed</st> such an <st data-num="02154" class="">unthinkable</st> <st data-num="05039" class="">atrocity</st><n id="3" /> in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.
All you Israelites, make a decision here!”
All Israel rose up in unison and said, “Not one of us will go home! Not one of us will return to his house!

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> is <st data-num="01697 0834">what</st> we will <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> to <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st>: We will <st data-num="05927 05921">attack</st> the city as the <st data-num="01486" class="">lot</st> dictates.<n id="1" />

We will <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="06235" class="">ten</st> of every group of a <st data-num="03967" class="">hundred</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> (and a <st data-num="03967" class="">hundred</st> of every group of a <st data-num="0505" class="">thousand</st>, and a <st data-num="0505" class="">thousand</st> of every group of <st data-num="07233" class="">ten thousand</st>) to <st data-num="03947" class="">get</st> <st data-num="06720" class="">supplies</st> for the <st data-num="05971" class="">army</st>.<n id="1" /> When they <st data-num="0935" class="">arrive</st> in <st data-num="01387" class="">Gibeah</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>, they will <st data-num="06213" class="">punish</st> them <st data-num="03605" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="05039" class="">atrocity</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> they <st data-num="06213" class="">committed</st> in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.”<n id="2" />
So all the men of Israel gathered together at the city as allies.
The tribes of Israel sent men throughout the tribe of Benjamin, saying, “How could such a wicked thing take place?

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st>, <st data-num="05414" class="">hand over</st> the <st data-num="0376 01121 01100 0834">good-for-nothings</st><n id="1" /> in <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st>, so we can <st data-num="04191" class="">execute</st> them and <st data-num="01197" class="">purge</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> of <st data-num="07451" class="">wickedness</st>.”<n id="2" /> But the <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjaminites</st> <st data-num="03808 014">refused</st> to <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">to</st> their <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelite</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>.

The <st data-num="01121 01144">Benjaminites</st> came <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> their <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and <st data-num="0622" class="">assembled</st> at <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="03318" class="">make</st> <st data-num="04421" class="">war</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>.

<st data-num="01931" class="">That</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> the <st data-num="01121 01144">Benjaminites</st> <st data-num="06485" class="">mustered</st> from their <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> <st data-num="06242 08337 0505" class="">26,000</st> <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>-<st data-num="08025" class="">wielding</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">soldiers</st>, <st data-num="0905" class="">besides</st> <st data-num="07651 03967" class="">700</st> <st data-num="0970" class="">well-trained</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">soldiers</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">from</st> <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="03605" class="">Among</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">army</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="07651 03967" class="">700</st> <st data-num="0970" class="">specially trained</st> <st data-num="0334 03027 03225">left-handed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0376" class="">soldiers</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">Each</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">one</st> could <st data-num="07049" class="">sling</st> a <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st> and <st data-num="03808 02398">hit</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">even</st> the <st data-num="08185" class="">smallest target</st>.<n id="4" />
The men of Israel (not counting Benjamin) had mustered 400,000 sword-wielding soldiers, every one an experienced warrior.
The Israelites went up to Bethel and asked God, “Who should lead the charge against the Benjaminites?” The Lord said, “Judah should lead.”

The <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> the next <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">moved</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st>.

The <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">marched out</st> to <st data-num="04421 05973">fight</st> <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>; <st data-num="0376 03478">they</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06186" class="">arranged</st> their <st data-num="04421" class="">battle lines</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st>.
The Benjaminites attacked from Gibeah and struck down 22,000 Israelites that day.
The Israelite army took heart and once more arranged their battle lines, in the same place where they had taken their positions the day before.
The Israelites went up and wept before the Lord until evening. They asked the Lord, “Should we again march out to fight the Benjaminites, our brothers?” The Lord said, “Attack them.”

So the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="07126" class="">marched</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01121 01144">Benjaminites</st> the <st data-num="08145" class="">next</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.
The Benjaminites again attacked them from Gibeah and struck down 18,000 sword-wielding Israelite soldiers.

So all the Israelites, the whole army, went up to Bethel. They wept and sat there before the Lord; they did not eat anything that day until evening. They offered up burnt sacrifices and tokens of peace to the Lord.
The Israelites asked the Lord (for the ark of God’s covenant was there in those days;

Phinehas son of Eleazar, son of Aaron, was serving the Lord in those days), “Should we once more march out to fight the Benjaminites our brothers, or should we quit?” The Lord said, “Attack, for tomorrow I will hand them over to you.”
So Israel hid men in ambush outside Gibeah.

The <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="05927 0413">attacked</st> the <st data-num="01121 01144">Benjaminites</st> the <st data-num="07992" class="">next</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>;<n id="1" /> they <st data-num="06186" class="">took their positions</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st> just as they had <st data-num="06471" class="">done</st> <st data-num="06471" class="">before</st>.

The <st data-num="01121 01144">Benjaminites</st> <st data-num="03318 07125">attacked</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05971" class="">army</st>, <st data-num="05423 04480">leaving</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="05423 04480">unguarded</st>.<n id="2" /> They <st data-num="02490" class="">began</st> to <st data-num="05221" class="">strike</st> <st data-num="02491" class="">down</st> their <st data-num="05971" class="">enemy</st><n id="3" /> just as they had <st data-num="06471" class="">done</st> <st data-num="06471" class="">before</st>. On the <st data-num="04546 0834">main roads</st> (<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">leads</st> to <st data-num="01008" class="">Bethel</st>,<n id="4" /> the <st data-num="0259" class="">other</st> to <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah)</st> and in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st>, they struck down<n id="5" /> about <st data-num="07970" class="">30</st> <st data-num="0376 03478">Israelites</st>.

Then the <st data-num="01121 01144">Benjaminites</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="01992" class="">They</st> are <st data-num="05062 06440">defeated</st> just as <st data-num="07223" class="">before</st>.” But the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Let’s <st data-num="05127" class="">retreat</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05423" class="">lure</st> them<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05423" class="">away</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="04546" class="">main roads</st>.”

<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> from their <st data-num="04725" class="">places</st> and <st data-num="06186" class="">took their positions</st> at <st data-num="01193" class="">Baal Tamar</st>, while the <st data-num="03478" class="">Israelites</st> <st data-num="0693" class="">hiding in ambush</st> <st data-num="01518" class="">jumped out</st> of their <st data-num="04725" class="">places</st> <st data-num="04629" class="">west</st> of <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st>.

Then <st data-num="06235 0505" class="">10,000</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>, <st data-num="0970">well-trained soldiers</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, <st data-num="0935" class="">made</st> <st data-num="05048" class="">a frontal</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">assault</st> against <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st>; the <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> <st data-num="03513" class="">was fierce</st>.<n id="1" /> But the <st data-num="01992" class="">Benjaminites</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">realize</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">disaster</st> <st data-num="05060 05921">was at</st> their <st data-num="05060 05921">doorstep</st>.<n id="2" />
The Lord annihilated Benjamin before Israel; the Israelites struck down that day 25,100 sword-wielding Benjaminites.

Then the Benjaminites saw they were defeated.

The Israelites retreated before Benjamin because they had confidence in the men they had hidden in ambush outside Gibeah.

The <st data-num="0693" class="">men hiding in ambush</st> <st data-num="06584" class="">made a</st> <st data-num="02363" class="">mad</st> <st data-num="06584" class="">dash</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="01390" class="">Gibeah</st>. <st data-num="0693" class="">They</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="04900" class="">attacked</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="05221" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="06310 02719">sword</st> to the <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>.

The <st data-num="0376 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="0693" class="">men hiding in ambush</st> had <st data-num="01961" class="">arranged</st> a <st data-num="04150" class="">signal</st>. When the men hiding in ambush<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07235 05927">sent up</st> a <st data-num="06227" class="">smoke</st> <st data-num="04864" class="">signal</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>,

the <st data-num="0376 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="02015 04421">counterattacked</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> had <st data-num="02490" class="">begun</st> to <st data-num="05221" class="">strike</st> <st data-num="02491" class="">down</st> the <st data-num="0376 03478">Israelites</st>;<n id="2" /> they struck down<n id="3" /> about <st data-num="07970" class="">30</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>. They <st data-num="03588 0559">said</st>, “<st data-num="0389" class="">There’s no doubt about it</st>! <st data-num="01931" class="">They</st> are <st data-num="05062" class="">totally</st> <st data-num="05062 06440">defeated</st> as in the <st data-num="07223" class="">earlier</st> <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st>.”

But when the <st data-num="04864" class="">signal</st>, a <st data-num="05982" class="">pillar</st> of <st data-num="06227" class="">smoke</st>, <st data-num="02490" class="">began</st> to <st data-num="05927" class="">rise up</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, the <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjaminites</st> <st data-num="06437" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">around</st> and <st data-num="02009" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="03632" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">going up</st> in a cloud of smoke that rose high into the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st>.<n id="1" />

When the <st data-num="0376 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="02015" class="">turned around</st>, the <st data-num="0376 01144">Benjaminites</st> <st data-num="0926" class="">panicked</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> they could <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">disaster</st> <st data-num="05060 05921">was on</st> their <st data-num="05060 05921">doorstep</st>.<n id="2" />

They <st data-num="06437" class="">retreated</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="0376 03478">Israelites</st>, <st data-num="0413" class="">taking</st> the <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st> to the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>. But the <st data-num="04421" class="">battle</st> <st data-num="01692" class="">overtook</st><n id="1" /> them as <st data-num="0834" class="">men</st> from the surrounding <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> <st data-num="07843 08432">struck</st> them <st data-num="07843 08432">down</st>.<n id="2" />

They <st data-num="03803" class="">surrounded</st> the <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjaminites</st>, <st data-num="07291" class="">chased</st> them from <st data-num="04496" class="">Nohah</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="01869" class="">annihilated</st><n id="2" /> them <st data-num="05704" class="">all the way to</st> a <st data-num="05227" class="">spot</st> <st data-num="04217 08121">east</st> of <st data-num="01390" class="">Geba</st>.<n id="3" />

So <st data-num="08083 06240 0505" class="">18,000</st> <st data-num="01144 0376">Benjaminites</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="0428" class="">them</st> <st data-num="02428" class="">capable</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">warriors</st>, <st data-num="05307" class="">fell dead</st>.

The rest<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06437" class="">turned</st> and <st data-num="05127" class="">ran</st> toward the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>, heading <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st> the <st data-num="05553" class="">cliff</st> of <st data-num="07417" class="">Rimmon</st>. But the Israelites<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05953" class="">caught</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="02568 0505" class="">5,000</st> of <st data-num="0376" class="">them</st> on the <st data-num="04546" class="">main roads</st>. They <st data-num="01692" class="">stayed right on</st> their <st data-num="0310" class="">heels</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">all the way to</st> <st data-num="01440" class="">Gidom</st> and <st data-num="05221" class="">struck down</st> <st data-num="0505" class="">2,000</st> <st data-num="04480 0376">more</st>.

<st data-num="01931" class="">That</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="06242 02568 0505" class="">25,000</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>-<st data-num="08025" class="">wielding</st> <st data-num="01144 0376">Benjaminites</st> <st data-num="01961 03605 05307">fell in battle</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="0428" class="">them</st> <st data-num="02428" class="">capable</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">warriors</st>.<n id="2" />

But <st data-num="08337 03967" class="">600</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">survivors</st> <st data-num="06437" class="">turned</st> and <st data-num="05127" class="">ran away</st> to the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>, <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05553" class="">cliff</st> of <st data-num="07417" class="">Rimmon</st>. They <st data-num="03427" class="">stayed</st> <st data-num="05553 07417">there</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">months</st>.
The Israelites returned to the Benjaminite towns and put the sword to them. They wiped out the cities, the animals, and everything they could find. They set fire to every city in their path.
